name: Yoga for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of yoga to improve flexibility, mental health, and overall physical balance. Perfect for those starting their yoga journey.

name: Advanced Pilates
description: Challenge your core strength, enhance posture, and build endurance with advanced pilates techniques designed for experienced participants.

name: HIIT Cardio
description: Burn calories, increase stamina, and improve heart health with high-intensity interval training workouts that push your limits.

name: Strength Training Basics
description: Master fundamental strength exercises to build muscle, enhance endurance, and achieve your fitness goals effectively.

name: Spin Class
description: Join this energizing indoor cycling session, ideal for improving cardio, toning muscles, and boosting your endurance levels.

name: Boxing Basics
description: Learn fundamental boxing techniques to improve agility, build strength, and increase confidence in a fun and challenging way.

name: CrossFit Challenge
description: Engage in high-intensity workouts combining cardio, strength, and functional movements to push your fitness to the next level.

name: Aerobics
description: Boost your cardiovascular health, improve stamina, and have fun with this high-energy aerobic session suitable for all fitness levels.

name: Meditation and Relaxation
description: Reduce stress, calm your mind, and achieve inner peace with guided meditation and relaxation techniques tailored for everyone.

name: Bootcamp
description: Test your limits and build full-body strength with a mix of cardio, resistance training, and bodyweight exercises in this intensive session.

name: Flexibility Training
description: Improve your flexibility, reduce muscle tension, and prevent injuries with targeted exercises designed for all fitness levels.
